players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I noticed that Bob was found dead last night. I'm not sure what happened, but it seems suspicious. Let's discuss this and see if anyone has any information or theories."
Charlie: "I saw Charlie last night. He seemed suspiciously quiet and I'm not sure if he had anything to do with Bob's death."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
